an8.14:1.1: “Attha ca, bhikkhave, assakhalunke desessami attha ca assadose, attha ca purisakhalunke attha ca purisadose.
an8.14:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an8.14:1.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an8.14:2.1: “Katame ca, bhikkhave, attha assakhalunka attha ca assadosa?
an8.14:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina pacchato patikkamati, pitthito ratham pavatteti.
an8.14:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina paccha langhati, kubbaram hanati, tidandam bhanjati.
an8.14:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina rathisaya satthim ussajjitva rathisamyeva ajjhomaddati.
an8.14:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina ummaggam ganhati, ubbatumam ratham karoti.
an8.14:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina langhati purimakayam pagganhati purime pade.
an8.14:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina anadiyitva sarathim anadiyitva patodalatthim dantehi mukhadhanam vidhamsitva yena kamam pakkamati.
an8.14:8.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina neva abhikkamati no patikkamati tattheva khilatthayi thito hoti.
an8.14:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina purime ca pade samharitva pacchime ca pade samharitva tattheva cattaro pade abhinisidati.
an8.14:9.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha assakhalunka attha ca assadosa.
an8.14:10.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, attha purisakhalunka attha ca purisadosa?
an8.14:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:10.3: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano ‘na sarami’ti asatiya nibbetheti.
an8.14:10.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina pacchato patikkamati, pitthito ratham vatteti;
an8.14:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:11.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano codakamyeva patippharati:
an8.14:11.3: ‘kim nu kho tuyham balassa abyattassa bhanitena.
an8.14:11.5: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina paccha langhati, kubbaram hanati, tidandam bhanjati;
an8.14:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:12.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano codakasseva paccaropeti:
an8.14:12.3: ‘tvam khosi itthannamam apattim apanno, tvam tava pathamam patikarohi’ti.
an8.14:12.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina rathisaya satthim ussajjitva rathisamyeva ajjhomaddati;
an8.14:13.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:13.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano annenannam paticarati, bahiddha katham apanameti, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an8.14:13.3: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina ummaggam ganhati, ubbatumam ratham karoti;
an8.14:14.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:14.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano sanghamajjhe bahuvikkhepam karoti.
an8.14:14.3: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina langhati, purimakayam pagganhati purime pade;
an8.14:15.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:15.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano anadiyitva sangham anadiyitva codakam sapattikova yena kamam pakkamati.
an8.14:15.3: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina anadiyitva sarathim anadiyitva patodalatthim dantehi mukhadhanam vidhamsitva yena kamam pakkamati;
an8.14:16.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:16.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano ‘nevaham apannomhi, na panaham apannomhi’ti so tunhibhavena sangham vihetheti.
an8.14:16.3: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina neva abhikkamati no patikkamati tattheva khilatthayi thito hoti;
an8.14:17.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhikkhum apattiya codenti.
an8.14:17.2: So bhikkhu bhikkhuhi apattiya codiyamano evamaha:
an8.14:17.3: ‘kim nu kho tumhe ayasmanto atibalham mayi byavata yava idanaham sikkham paccakkhaya hinayavattissami’ti.
an8.14:17.6: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, assakhalunko ‘pehi’ti vutto, viddho samano codito sarathina purime ca pade samharitva pacchime ca pade samharitva tattheva cattaro pade abhinisidati;
an8.14:17.10: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha purisakhalunka attha ca purisadosa”ti.
